item.title: Hello, World
item.description: Welcome. This is my personal website and its initial setup right now. GitHub is serving as host, Hugo is the blogging engine, and the theme is this one heavily modified. Although there’s plenty to fix and finish, a start’s a start. Hugo definitely presents a far steeper learning curve than Jekyll, and its benefits are not apparent yet. But, giving any tech a proper run-through is important, and I consider a proper run-through as getting to a production MVP.
